title: SAP Demo Data Personalization Add-On Enhances Customer-Focused Demonstrations
summary: SAP has introduced a new add-on for data personalization to enhance customer-focused demonstrations. This tool promises to provide personalized, real-time demos, improving relevance for sales teams and customers.
hook: SAP's new add-on promises personalized, real-time demos.

title: Workers challenge ‘hidden’ AI hiring tools in class action with major regulatory stakes
summary: A class action lawsuit in California alleges that AI hiring technologies, specifically those used by Eightfold AI, are unfairly profiling job applicants by collecting sensitive and often inaccurate information. The lawsuit argues that these tools should be regulated similarly to credit report bureaus, indicating a potential shift in the regulatory landscape for AI in HR service management.
hook: AI hiring tools under fire in class action lawsuit

title: The new CDIO stack: Tech, talent and storytelling
summary: The role of a Chief Digital and Information Officer (CDIO) is evolving to include not just technology, but also talent management and storytelling. This shift could impact the way ITSM, ITOM, HRSM, ESM, and EX buyers approach their strategies and decision-making processes.
hook: CDIO role evolves beyond tech to talent and storytelling.

title: Sebastian Klovig Skelton
summary: The article provides information about Sebastian Klovig Skelton, the data & ethics editor at Computer Weekly, who covers data protection issues and the socio-technical impacts of data-driven systems on people, business, and society. There are no new changes or implications for ES buyers.
hook: Meet Sebastian Klovig Skelton, Data & Ethics Editor at Computer Weekly.
